div.p: CIVILIANS ON THAT BATION IN CUBA.
AND MOST OF THEM LIKE TO CELEBRATE CHRISTMAS WITH
DECORATIONS. BUT NOW THE GITMO COMMANDER
DR. JOHN NETTLETON HAS ORDERED TWO NATIVITY SCENES
REMOVED FROM DINING HALLS. THIS AFTER SOME COMPLAINTS.
JOINING US FROM ALBUQUERQUE,
NEW MEXICO. MIKEY WEINSTEIN.
MILITARY RELIGIOUS FREEDOM FOUNDATION.
ARE YOU BEHIND, THIS MR. WEINSTEIN?
>> WELL, BILL, LET’S NOT USE LOADED QUESTIONS.
WE HAD 18 MEMBERS OF THE UNITED STATES MILITARY THAT
CAME TO US BECAUSE THEY WERE VERY VERY UPSET AND
CONCERNED ABOUT WHAT THEY VIEWED AS A VIOLATION OF
THEIR CIVIL RIGHTS. THEY DIDN’T FEEL COMFORTABLE
GOING UP THEIR CHAIN OF COMMAND FOR FEAR OF REPRISAL
AND LET PRIX BIEWTION SO THEY CAME TO US.
THAT’S THE REASON OVER
35,000 MEMBERS OF THE MILITARY HAVE COME TO US.
WE WENT TO THE PENTAGON. WE MADE IT CLEAR WE THOUGHT
THIS WAS COMPLETELY NOT INAPPROPRIATE BUT UNLAWFUL.
AND AS THEY HAVE DONE IN THE PAST THE PENTAGON THOUGHT
ABOUT IT FOR A THOUGHT ABOUT IT AND AGREED WITH US.
WE DON’T HAVE MRFF STORM TROOPERS TO INVADE GUANTANAMO.
THEY MADE THE RIGHT DECISION AND WE APPLAUD THEM.
>> CALM DOWN. STORM TROOPERS?
RIDICULOUS. THE 18 THAT COMPLAINED TO YOU.
DID YOU RELEASE THEIR NAMES? DO YOU HAVE THEIR NAMES?
SPL NO. WE ARE NOT GOING TO.
THAT’S PART OF THE REASON THEY CAME THROUGH US IS THEY WANT
ANONYMITY. >> I GOT IT.
>> WE HAD -- >> IS THERE ANYONE AMONG THE 18
THAT WOULD COME ON THIS PROGRAM AND EXPLAIN WHY THEY WERE
OFFENDED BECAUSE IT WAS A FEDERAL HOLIDAY AND IT HONORS
THE BIRTH OF JESUS. PASSED BY CONGRESS, SIGNED BY
PRESIDENT GRANT. THE NATIVITY SCENE BASICALLY
PORTRAYS WHAT HAPPENED ON CHRISTMAS DAY.
BECAUSE IT IS A FEDERAL HOLIDAY, IT SEEMS TO BE IN CONTEXT.
IT’S NOT LIKE YOU ARE MAKING ANYBODY AT GUANTANAMO BAY PRAY
OR GO TO CHURCH OR SAY HALLELUJAH, I LOVE JESUS.
IT’S A DEPICTION OF THE FEDERAL HOLIDAY.
IF SOMEBODY IS OFFENDED I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHY.
IT SEEMS OUT OF 18 ONE WOULD HAVE THE CAJONES TO TELL ME WHY
THEY ARE OFFENDED. >> MY PARENTS ARE BIG FANS OF
THE SHOW. MY MOTHER TOLD ME TO BE NICE, SO
I WILL STAY MELLOW. WHERE DO I BEGIN?
I UNDERSTAND PEOPLE THINK THIS IS POLITICAL CORRECTNESS RUN
AMOK. WE ARE SEEING CHRISTIAN
PRIVILEGE PREVIOUSLY UNCHANNELED BEING CHALLENGED NOW.
>> WHY IS IT CHRISTIAN PRIVILEGE?
ISN’T IT A NATIONAL HOLIDAY? WAIT A MINUTE.
>> NO, NO. >> IT’S A NATIONAL HOLIDAY, NOT
A CHRISTIAN HOLIDAY. >> BILL, BILL, I KNOW IT IS.
>> IT’S A NATIONAL HOLIDAY. >> I KNOW IT IS.
CAN I RESPOND NOW, PLEASE? I’M YOUR GUEST, LET ME TRY TO
RESPOND. CHRISTIAN PRIVILEGE IS NOW GONE.
PREVIOUSLY UNCHALLENGED. WELCOME TO THE LAND OF EQUALITY.
YOU MUST ALL SHARE YOUR TOYS. I UNDERSTAND PEOPLE DON’T LIKE
THAT. >> LOOK, MR. WEINSTEIN, NOT
MAKING SENSE TO ME. I KNOW I’M NOT AS SMART AS YOU,
BUT YOU’RE T NOT MAKING SENSE. >> OH, COME ON.
>> IT IS A NATIONAL HOLIDAY. >> HAVE YOU EVER BEEN IN THE
MILITARY? SIMPLE YES OR NO.
>> I HAVE NOT. >> OKAY.
LET ME TRY TO SAY SOMETHING TO YOU.
WHEN YOU ARE IN THE MILITARY IT’S NOT LIKE WORKING AT FOX OR
COSTCO.
IT IS A TRIBAL AND RITUALISTIC PLACE.
THERE ARE REGULATIONS IN PLACE THAT ABSOLUTELY MAKE IT CLEAR
THAT THIS WAS WRONG. >> ALL RIGHT.
>> THE AIR FORCE AGREED WITH THEM.
>> IT WAS A COWARDLY DECISION BY THE BASE COMMANDER.
>> NO, IT WASN’T. >> IT WAS COWARDLY.
THIS IS A DEPICTION OF A SECULAR HOLIDAY SIGNED INTO LAW.
THAT’S WHAT IT WAS. IF SOMEBODY IS OFFENDED I WANT
TO KNOW WHY AND YOUR GUYS DON’T HAVE THE COURAGE TO STAND UP AND
TELL ME. >> BILL --
>> I WILL GIVE YOU THE LAST WORD.
20 SECONDS. GO.
>> OKAY. BILL, PLEASE DON’T CALL OUR
MEMBERS OF THE MILITARY COWARDS. THE MAJORITY OF THEM ARE
CHRISTIANS.
IF YOU WANT TO GET ADD HOMONYM THEY JOINED AND ARE WILLING TO
FIGHT. THEY UNDERSTAND WHAT THEIR
RIGHTS ARE. YOUR KRIRN PERSONAL RIGHTS WILL
BE TRUMPED BY THE CIVIL RIGHTS OF YOUR FELLOW AMERICANS.
>> DO YOU KNOW WHAT? WITH ALL DUE RESPECT TO YOUR
PARENTS YOU ARE A BLOVIATOR, DON’T ANSWER THE QUESTION.
I COVERED -- >> YOU’RE AN ARROGANT IDIOT.
>> CUT HIM OFF. HE’S A JERK.
>> I COVERED FOUR WARS WITH A PEN, ALL RIGHT?
DON’T IMPUGN MY COURAGE EVER AGAIN.
YOU’RE A WEASEL. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
A NICE CHRISTMAS GIFT THAT WILL COST YOU NOTHING TO GIVE.
COST YOU NOTHING TO GIVE.THE TIP IS MOMENTS AWAY.
[ ENGINE REVS ]
